title: Recertify for Housing Assistance Benefits
description: A citizen currently receiving housing assistance needs to complete their annual recertification to continue receiving benefits.

tasks.description: Identify the citizen and their existing benefits case.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the citizen's active housing assistance case.

tasks.description: Guide the citizen through the recertification form, verifying their current income, household composition, and expenses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps the citizen accurately complete the recertification application.

tasks.description: Submit the recertification and inform the citizen of the outcome or if more information is needed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the form, which is auto-approved, and confirms the citizen's benefits will continue.
